title: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: Currently, when changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
EB: The preview should display the entire parameter name without being cut off.
SR: To fix this issue, please update the code to ensure that the preview correctly displays the complete parameter name, even if it is very long.
